name: market for gas motor, 206kW | gas motor, 206kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6731/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'gas motor, 206kW', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a gas motor that is used in an existing natural gas cogeneration plant. It has a 206 kW capacity and weighs 1400 kg. The process includes all materials necessary to construct it and energy and water consumption during manufacturing. Life time for operation assumed at 70'000 h.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
